com.sun.kvem.midp.io.j2se.wma
Interface WMAMessage

All Known Implementing Classes:
Message, MultipartMessage
public interface WMAMessage

A WMA Message. This interface is used to unify the Message and MultipartMessage objects under a single hierarchy, to simplify the design of the WMAClient.
